    6859                 :             :     string description; // Description of the fee.
    6860                 :             : }
    6861                 :             : 
    6862                 :             : /**
    6863                 :             :  * @title IOFT
    6864                 :             :  * @dev Interface for the OftChain (OFT) token.
    6865                 :             :  * @dev Does not inherit ERC20 to accommodate usage by OFTAdapter as well.
    6866                 :             :  * @dev This specific interface ID is '0x02e49c2c'.
    6867                 :             :  */
    6868                 :             : interface IOFT {
    6869                 :             :     // Custom error messages
    6870                 :             :     error InvalidLocalDecimals();
    6871                 :             :     error SlippageExceeded(uint256 amountLD, uint256 minAmountLD);
    6872                 :             : 
    6873                 :             :     // Events
    6874                 :             :     event OFTSent(
    6875                 :             :         bytes32 indexed guid, // GUID of the OFT message.
    6876                 :             :         uint32 dstEid, // Destination Endpoint ID.
    6877                 :             :         address indexed fromAddress, // Address of the sender on the src chain.
    6878                 :             :         uint256 amountSentLD, // Amount of tokens sent in local decimals.
    6879                 :             :         uint256 amountReceivedLD // Amount of tokens received in local decimals.
    6880                 :             :     );
    6881                 :             :     event OFTReceived(
    6882                 :             :         bytes32 indexed guid, // GUID of the OFT message.
    6883                 :             :         uint32 srcEid, // Source Endpoint ID.
    6884                 :             :         address indexed toAddress, // Address of the recipient on the dst chain.
    6885                 :             :         uint256 amountReceivedLD // Amount of tokens received in local decimals.
    6886                 :             :     );
    6887                 :             : 
    6888                 :             :     /**
    6889                 :             :      * @notice Retrieves interfaceID and the version of the OFT.
    6890                 :             :      * @return interfaceId The interface ID.
    6891                 :             :      * @return version The version.
    6892                 :             :      *
    6893                 :             :      * @dev interfaceId: This specific interface ID is '0x02e49c2c'.
    6894                 :             :      * @dev version: Indicates a cross-chain compatible msg encoding with other OFTs.
    6895                 :             :      * @dev If a new feature is added to the OFT cross-chain msg encoding, the version will be incremented.
    6896                 :             :      * ie. localOFT version(x,1) CAN send messages to remoteOFT version(x,1)
    6897                 :             :      */
    6898                 :             :     function oftVersion() external view returns (bytes4 interfaceId, uint64 version);
    6899                 :             : 
    6900                 :             :     /**
    6901                 :             :      * @notice Retrieves the address of the token associated with the OFT.
    6902                 :             :      * @return token The address of the ERC20 token implementation.
    6903                 :             :      */
    6904                 :             :     function token() external view returns (address);
    6905                 :             : 
    6906                 :             :     /**
    6907                 :             :      * @notice Indicates whether the OFT contract requires approval of the 'token()' to send.
    6908                 :             :      * @return requiresApproval Needs approval of the underlying token implementation.
    6909                 :             :      *
    6910                 :             :      * @dev Allows things like wallet implementers to determine integration requirements,
    6911                 :             :      * without understanding the underlying token implementation.
    6912                 :             :      */
    6913                 :             :     function approvalRequired() external view returns (bool);
    6914                 :             : 
    6915                 :             :     /**
    6916                 :             :      * @notice Retrieves the shared decimals of the OFT.
    6917                 :             :      * @return sharedDecimals The shared decimals of the OFT.
    6918                 :             :      */
    6919                 :             :     function sharedDecimals() external view returns (uint8);
    6920                 :             : 
    6921                 :             :     /**
    6922                 :             :      * @notice Provides the fee breakdown and settings data for an OFT. Unused in the default implementation.
    6923                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send operation.
    6924                 :             :      * @return limit The OFT limit information.
    6925                 :             :      * @return oftFeeDetails The details of OFT fees.
    6926                 :             :      * @return receipt The OFT receipt information.
    6927                 :             :      */
    6928                 :             :     function quoteOFT(
    6929                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam
    6930                 :             :     ) external view returns (OFTLimit memory, OFTFeeDetail[] memory oftFeeDetails, OFTReceipt memory);
    6931                 :             : 
    6932                 :             :     /**
    6933                 :             :      * @notice Provides a quote for the send() operation.
    6934                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send() operation.
    6935                 :             :      * @param _payInLzToken Flag indicating whether the caller is paying in the LZ token.
    6936                 :             :      * @return fee The calculated LayerZero messaging fee from the send() operation.
    6937                 :             :      *
    6938                 :             :      * @dev MessagingFee: LayerZero msg fee
    6939                 :             :      *  - nativeFee: The native fee.
    6940                 :             :      *  - lzTokenFee: The lzToken fee.
    6941                 :             :      */
    6942                 :             :     function quoteSend(SendParam calldata _sendParam, bool _payInLzToken) external view returns (MessagingFee memory);
    6943                 :             : 
    6944                 :             :     /**
    6945                 :             :      * @notice Executes the send() operation.
    6946                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send operation.
    6947                 :             :      * @param _fee The fee information supplied by the caller.
    6948                 :             :      *      - nativeFee: The native fee.
    6949                 :             :      *      - lzTokenFee: The lzToken fee.
    6950                 :             :      * @param _refundAddress The address to receive any excess funds from fees etc. on the src.
    6951                 :             :      * @return receipt The LayerZero messaging receipt from the send() operation.
    6952                 :             :      * @return oftReceipt The OFT receipt information.
    6953                 :             :      *

    6955                 :             :      *  - guid: The unique identifier for the sent message.
    6956                 :             :      *  - nonce: The nonce of the sent message.
    6957                 :             :      *  - fee: The LayerZero fee incurred for the message.
    6958                 :             :      */

    6960                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam,
    6961                 :             :         MessagingFee calldata _fee,

    6965                 :             : 
    6966                 :             : // node_modules/@openzeppelin/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Permit.sol
    6967                 :             : 
    6968                 :             : // OpenZeppelin Contracts (last updated v5.1.0) (token/ERC20/extensions/ERC20Permit.sol)
    6969                 :             : 
    6970                 :             : /**
    6971                 :             :  * @dev Implementation of the ERC-20 Permit extension allowing approvals to be made via signatures, as defined in
    6972                 :             :  * https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2612[ERC-2612].
    6973                 :             :  *
    6974                 :             :  * Adds the {permit} method, which can be used to change an account's ERC-20 allowance (see {IERC20-allowance}) by
    6975                 :             :  * presenting a message signed by the account. By not relying on `{IERC20-approve}`, the token holder account doesn't
    6976                 :             :  * need to send a transaction, and thus is not required to hold Ether at all.
    6977                 :             :  */
    6978                 :             : abstract contract ERC20Permit is ERC20, IERC20Permit, EIP712, Nonces {
    6979                 :             :     bytes32 private constant PERMIT_TYPEHASH =
    6980                 :             :         keccak256("Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)");
    6981                 :             : 
    6982                 :             :     /**
    6983                 :             :      * @dev Permit deadline has expired.
    6984                 :             :      */
    6985                 :             :     error ERC2612ExpiredSignature(uint256 deadline);
    6986                 :             : 
    6987                 :             :     /**
    6988                 :             :      * @dev Mismatched signature.
    6989                 :             :      */
    6990                 :             :     error ERC2612InvalidSigner(address signer, address owner);
    6991                 :             : 
    6992                 :             :     /**
    6993                 :             :      * @dev Initializes the {EIP712} domain separator using the `name` parameter, and setting `version` to `"1"`.
    6994                 :             :      *
    6995                 :             :      * It's a good idea to use the same `name` that is defined as the ERC-20 token name.
    6996                 :             :      */
    6997                 :             :     constructor(string memory name) EIP712(name, "1") {}
    6998                 :             : 
    6999                 :             :     /**
    7000                 :             :      * @inheritdoc IERC20Permit
    7001                 :             :      */
    7002                 :           0 :     function permit(
    7003                 :             :         address owner,
    7004                 :             :         address spender,
    7005                 :             :         uint256 value,
    7006                 :             :         uint256 deadline,
    7007                 :             :         uint8 v,
    7008                 :             :         bytes32 r,
    7009                 :             :         bytes32 s
    7010                 :             :     ) public virtual {
    7011            [ # ]:           0 :         if (block.timestamp > deadline) {
    7012                 :           0 :             revert ERC2612ExpiredSignature(deadline);
    7013                 :             :         }
    7014                 :             : 
    7015                 :           0 :         bytes32 structHash = keccak256(abi.encode(PERMIT_TYPEHASH, owner, spender, value, _useNonce(owner), deadline));
    7016                 :             : 
    7017                 :           0 :         bytes32 hash = _hashTypedDataV4(structHash);
    7018                 :             : 
    7019                 :           0 :         address signer = ECDSA.recover(hash, v, r, s);
    7020            [ # ]:           0 :         if (signer != owner) {
    7021                 :           0 :             revert ERC2612InvalidSigner(signer, owner);
    7022                 :             :         }
    7023                 :             : 
    7024                 :           0 :         _approve(owner, spender, value);
    7025                 :             :     }
    7026                 :             : 
    7027                 :             :     /**
    7028                 :             :      * @inheritdoc IERC20Permit
    7029                 :             :      */
    7030                 :           0 :     function nonces(address owner) public view virtual override(IERC20Permit, Nonces) returns (uint256) {
    7031                 :           0 :         return super.nonces(owner);
    7032                 :             :     }
    7033                 :             : 
    7034                 :             :     /**
    7035                 :             :      * @inheritdoc IERC20Permit
    7036                 :             :      */
    7037                 :             :     // solhint-disable-next-line func-name-mixedcase
    7038                 :           0 :     function DOMAIN_SEPARATOR() external view virtual returns (bytes32) {
    7039                 :           0 :         return _domainSeparatorV4();
    7040                 :             :     }
    7041                 :             : }
    7042                 :             : 
    7043                 :             : // node_modules/@layerzerolabs/oapp-evm/contracts/oapp/OApp.sol
    7044                 :             : 
    7045                 :             : // @dev Import the 'MessagingFee' and 'MessagingReceipt' so it's exposed to OApp implementers
    7046                 :             : // solhint-disable-next-line no-unused-import
    7047                 :             : 
    7048                 :             : // @dev Import the 'Origin' so it's exposed to OApp implementers
    7049                 :             : // solhint-disable-next-line no-unused-import
    7050                 :             : 
    7051                 :             : /**
    7052                 :             :  * @title OApp
    7053                 :             :  * @dev Abstract contract serving as the base for OApp implementation, combining OAppSender and OAppReceiver functionality.
    7054                 :             :  */
    7055                 :             : abstract contract OApp is OAppSender, OAppReceiver {
    7056                 :             :     /**
    7057                 :             :      * @dev Constructor to initialize the OApp with the provided endpoint and owner.
    7058                 :             :      * @param _endpoint The address of the LOCAL LayerZero endpoint.
    7059                 :             :      * @param _delegate The delegate capable of making OApp configurations inside of the endpoint.
    7060                 :             :      */
    7061                 :             :     constructor(address _endpoint, address _delegate) OAppCore(_endpoint, _delegate) {}
    7062                 :             : 
    7063                 :             :     /**
    7064                 :             :      * @notice Retrieves the OApp version information.
    7065                 :             :      * @return senderVersion The version of the OAppSender.sol implementation.
    7066                 :             :      * @return receiverVersion The version of the OAppReceiver.sol implementation.
    7067                 :             :      */
    7068                 :           0 :     function oAppVersion()
    7069                 :             :         public
    7070                 :             :         pure
    7071                 :             :         virtual
    7072                 :             :         override(OAppSender, OAppReceiver)
    7073                 :             :         returns (uint64 senderVersion, uint64 receiverVersion)
    7074                 :             :     {
    7075                 :           0 :         return (SENDER_VERSION, RECEIVER_VERSION);
    7076                 :             :     }
    7077                 :             : }
    7078                 :             : 
    7079                 :             : // node_modules/@layerzerolabs/oft-evm/contracts/OFTCore.sol
    7080                 :             : 
    7081                 :             : /**
    7082                 :             :  * @title OFTCore
    7083                 :             :  * @dev Abstract contract for the OftChain (OFT) token.
    7084                 :             :  */
    7085                 :             : abstract contract OFTCore is IOFT, OApp, OAppPreCrimeSimulator, OAppOptionsType3 {
    7086                 :             :     using OFTMsgCodec for bytes;
    7087                 :             :     using OFTMsgCodec for bytes32;
    7088                 :             : 
    7089                 :             :     // @notice Provides a conversion rate when swapping between denominations of SD and LD
    7090                 :             :     //      - shareDecimals == SD == shared Decimals
    7091                 :             :     //      - localDecimals == LD == local decimals
    7092                 :             :     // @dev Considers that tokens have different decimal amounts on various chains.
    7093                 :             :     // @dev eg.
    7094                 :             :     //  For a token
    7095                 :             :     //      - locally with 4 decimals --> 1.2345 => uint(12345)
    7096                 :             :     //      - remotely with 2 decimals --> 1.23 => uint(123)
    7097                 :             :     //      - The conversion rate would be 10 ** (4 - 2) = 100
    7098                 :             :     //  @dev If you want to send 1.2345 -> (uint 12345), you CANNOT represent that value on the remote,
    7099                 :             :     //  you can only display 1.23 -> uint(123).
    7100                 :             :     //  @dev To preserve the dust that would otherwise be lost on that conversion,
    7101                 :             :     //  we need to unify a denomination that can be represented on ALL chains inside of the OFT mesh
    7102                 :             :     uint256 public immutable decimalConversionRate;
    7103                 :             : 
    7104                 :             :     // @notice Msg types that are used to identify the various OFT operations.
    7105                 :             :     // @dev This can be extended in child contracts for non-default oft operations
    7106                 :             :     // @dev These values are used in things like combineOptions() in OAppOptionsType3.sol.
    7107                 :             :     uint16 public constant SEND = 1;
    7108                 :             :     uint16 public constant SEND_AND_CALL = 2;
    7109                 :             : 
    7110                 :             :     // Address of an optional contract to inspect both 'message' and 'options'
    7111                 :             :     address public msgInspector;
    7112                 :             :     event MsgInspectorSet(address inspector);
    7113                 :             : 
    7114                 :             :     /**
    7115                 :             :      * @dev Constructor.
    7116                 :             :      * @param _localDecimals The decimals of the token on the local chain (this chain).
    7117                 :             :      * @param _endpoint The address of the LayerZero endpoint.
    7118                 :             :      * @param _delegate The delegate capable of making OApp configurations inside of the endpoint.
    7119                 :             :      */
    7120                 :          58 :     constructor(uint8 _localDecimals, address _endpoint, address _delegate) OApp(_endpoint, _delegate) {
    7121            [ # ]:          58 :         if (_localDecimals < sharedDecimals()) revert InvalidLocalDecimals();
    7122                 :          58 :         decimalConversionRate = 10 ** (_localDecimals - sharedDecimals());
    7123                 :             :     }
    7124                 :             : 
    7125                 :             :     /**
    7126                 :             :      * @notice Retrieves interfaceID and the version of the OFT.
    7127                 :             :      * @return interfaceId The interface ID.
    7128                 :             :      * @return version The version.
    7129                 :             :      *
    7130                 :             :      * @dev interfaceId: This specific interface ID is '0x02e49c2c'.
    7131                 :             :      * @dev version: Indicates a cross-chain compatible msg encoding with other OFTs.
    7132                 :             :      * @dev If a new feature is added to the OFT cross-chain msg encoding, the version will be incremented.
    7133                 :             :      * ie. localOFT version(x,1) CAN send messages to remoteOFT version(x,1)
    7134                 :             :      */
    7135                 :           0 :     function oftVersion() external pure virtual returns (bytes4 interfaceId, uint64 version) {
    7136                 :           0 :         return (type(IOFT).interfaceId, 1);
    7137                 :             :     }
    7138                 :             : 
    7139                 :             :     /**
    7140                 :             :      * @dev Retrieves the shared decimals of the OFT.
    7141                 :             :      * @return The shared decimals of the OFT.
    7142                 :             :      *
    7143                 :             :      * @dev Sets an implicit cap on the amount of tokens, over uint64.max() will need some sort of outbound cap / totalSupply cap
    7144                 :             :      * Lowest common decimal denominator between chains.
    7145                 :             :      * Defaults to 6 decimal places to provide up to 18,446,744,073,709.551615 units (max uint64).
    7146                 :             :      * For tokens exceeding this totalSupply(), they will need to override the sharedDecimals function with something smaller.
    7147                 :             :      * ie. 4 sharedDecimals would be 1,844,674,407,370,955.1615
    7148                 :             :      */
    7149                 :          58 :     function sharedDecimals() public view virtual returns (uint8) {
    7150                 :          58 :         return 6;
    7151                 :             :     }
    7152                 :             : 
    7153                 :             :     /**
    7154                 :             :      * @dev Sets the message inspector address for the OFT.
    7155                 :             :      * @param _msgInspector The address of the message inspector.
    7156                 :             :      *
    7157                 :             :      * @dev This is an optional contract that can be used to inspect both 'message' and 'options'.
    7158                 :             :      * @dev Set it to address(0) to disable it, or set it to a contract address to enable it.
    7159                 :             :      */
    7160                 :           0 :     function setMsgInspector(address _msgInspector) public virtual onlyOwner {
    7161                 :           0 :         msgInspector = _msgInspector;
    7162                 :           0 :         emit MsgInspectorSet(_msgInspector);
    7163                 :             :     }
    7164                 :             : 
    7165                 :             :     /**
    7166                 :             :      * @notice Provides the fee breakdown and settings data for an OFT. Unused in the default implementation.
    7167                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send operation.
    7168                 :             :      * @return oftLimit The OFT limit information.
    7169                 :             :      * @return oftFeeDetails The details of OFT fees.
    7170                 :             :      * @return oftReceipt The OFT receipt information.
    7171                 :             :      */
    7172                 :           0 :     function quoteOFT(
    7173                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam
    7174                 :             :     )
    7175                 :             :         external
    7176                 :             :         view
    7177                 :             :         virtual
    7178                 :             :         returns (OFTLimit memory oftLimit, OFTFeeDetail[] memory oftFeeDetails, OFTReceipt memory oftReceipt)
    7179                 :             :     {
    7180                 :           0 :         uint256 minAmountLD = 0; // Unused in the default implementation.
    7181                 :           0 :         uint256 maxAmountLD = IERC20(this.token()).totalSupply(); // Unused in the default implementation.
    7182                 :           0 :         oftLimit = OFTLimit(minAmountLD, maxAmountLD);
    7183                 :             : 
    7184                 :             :         // Unused in the default implementation; reserved for future complex fee details.
    7185                 :           0 :         oftFeeDetails = new OFTFeeDetail[](0);
    7186                 :             : 
    7187                 :             :         // @dev This is the same as the send() operation, but without the actual send.
    7188                 :             :         // - amountSentLD is the amount in local decimals that would be sent from the sender.
    7189                 :             :         // - amountReceivedLD is the amount in local decimals that will be credited to the recipient on the remote OFT instance.
    7190                 :             :         // @dev The amountSentLD MIGHT not equal the amount the user actually receives. HOWEVER, the default does.
    7191                 :           0 :         (uint256 amountSentLD, uint256 amountReceivedLD) = _debitView(
    7192                 :             :             _sendParam.amountLD,
    7193                 :             :             _sendParam.minAmountLD,
    7194                 :             :             _sendParam.dstEid
    7195                 :             :         );
    7196                 :           0 :         oftReceipt = OFTReceipt(amountSentLD, amountReceivedLD);
    7197                 :             :     }
    7198                 :             : 
    7199                 :             :     /**
    7200                 :             :      * @notice Provides a quote for the send() operation.
    7201                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send() operation.
    7202                 :             :      * @param _payInLzToken Flag indicating whether the caller is paying in the LZ token.
    7203                 :             :      * @return msgFee The calculated LayerZero messaging fee from the send() operation.
    7204                 :             :      *
    7205                 :             :      * @dev MessagingFee: LayerZero msg fee
    7206                 :             :      *  - nativeFee: The native fee.
    7207                 :             :      *  - lzTokenFee: The lzToken fee.
    7208                 :             :      */
    7209                 :           0 :     function quoteSend(
    7210                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam,
    7211                 :             :         bool _payInLzToken
    7212                 :             :     ) external view virtual returns (MessagingFee memory msgFee) {
    7213                 :             :         // @dev mock the amount to receive, this is the same operation used in the send().
    7214                 :             :         // The quote is as similar as possible to the actual send() operation.
    7215                 :           0 :         (, uint256 amountReceivedLD) = _debitView(_sendParam.amountLD, _sendParam.minAmountLD, _sendParam.dstEid);
    7216                 :             : 
    7217                 :             :         // @dev Builds the options and OFT message to quote in the endpoint.
    7218                 :           0 :         (bytes memory message, bytes memory options) = _buildMsgAndOptions(_sendParam, amountReceivedLD);
    7219                 :             : 
    7220                 :             :         // @dev Calculates the LayerZero fee for the send() operation.
    7221                 :           0 :         return _quote(_sendParam.dstEid, message, options, _payInLzToken);
    7222                 :             :     }
    7223                 :             : 
    7224                 :             :     /**
    7225                 :             :      * @dev Executes the send operation.
    7226                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send operation.
    7227                 :             :      * @param _fee The calculated fee for the send() operation.
    7228                 :             :      *      - nativeFee: The native fee.
    7229                 :             :      *      - lzTokenFee: The lzToken fee.
    7230                 :             :      * @param _refundAddress The address to receive any excess funds.
    7231                 :             :      * @return msgReceipt The receipt for the send operation.
    7232                 :             :      * @return oftReceipt The OFT receipt information.
    7233                 :             :      *
    7234                 :             :      * @dev MessagingReceipt: LayerZero msg receipt
    7235                 :             :      *  - guid: The unique identifier for the sent message.
    7236                 :             :      *  - nonce: The nonce of the sent message.
    7237                 :             :      *  - fee: The LayerZero fee incurred for the message.
    7238                 :             :      */
    7239                 :           0 :     function send(
    7240                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam,
    7241                 :             :         MessagingFee calldata _fee,
    7242                 :             :         address _refundAddress
    7243                 :             :     ) external payable virtual returns (MessagingReceipt memory msgReceipt, OFTReceipt memory oftReceipt) {
    7244                 :           0 :         return _send(_sendParam, _fee, _refundAddress);
    7245                 :             :     }
    7246                 :             : 
    7247                 :             :     /**
    7248                 :             :      * @dev Internal function to execute the send operation.
    7249                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send operation.
    7250                 :             :      * @param _fee The calculated fee for the send() operation.
    7251                 :             :      *      - nativeFee: The native fee.
    7252                 :             :      *      - lzTokenFee: The lzToken fee.
    7253                 :             :      * @param _refundAddress The address to receive any excess funds.
    7254                 :             :      * @return msgReceipt The receipt for the send operation.
    7255                 :             :      * @return oftReceipt The OFT receipt information.
    7256                 :             :      *
    7257                 :             :      * @dev MessagingReceipt: LayerZero msg receipt
    7258                 :             :      *  - guid: The unique identifier for the sent message.
    7259                 :             :      *  - nonce: The nonce of the sent message.
    7260                 :             :      *  - fee: The LayerZero fee incurred for the message.
    7261                 :             :      */
    7262                 :           0 :     function _send(
    7263                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam,
    7264                 :             :         MessagingFee calldata _fee,
    7265                 :             :         address _refundAddress
    7266                 :             :     ) internal virtual returns (MessagingReceipt memory msgReceipt, OFTReceipt memory oftReceipt) {
    7267                 :             :         // @dev Applies the token transfers regarding this send() operation.
    7268                 :             :         // - amountSentLD is the amount in local decimals that was ACTUALLY sent/debited from the sender.
    7269                 :             :         // - amountReceivedLD is the amount in local decimals that will be received/credited to the recipient on the remote OFT instance.
    7270                 :           0 :         (uint256 amountSentLD, uint256 amountReceivedLD) = _debit(
    7271                 :             :             msg.sender,
    7272                 :             :             _sendParam.amountLD,
    7273                 :             :             _sendParam.minAmountLD,
    7274                 :             :             _sendParam.dstEid
    7275                 :             :         );
    7276                 :             : 
    7277                 :             :         // @dev Builds the options and OFT message to quote in the endpoint.
    7278                 :           0 :         (bytes memory message, bytes memory options) = _buildMsgAndOptions(_sendParam, amountReceivedLD);
    7279                 :             : 
    7280                 :             :         // @dev Sends the message to the LayerZero endpoint and returns the LayerZero msg receipt.
    7281                 :           0 :         msgReceipt = _lzSend(_sendParam.dstEid, message, options, _fee, _refundAddress);
    7282                 :             :         // @dev Formulate the OFT receipt.
    7283                 :           0 :         oftReceipt = OFTReceipt(amountSentLD, amountReceivedLD);
    7284                 :             : 
    7285                 :           0 :         emit OFTSent(msgReceipt.guid, _sendParam.dstEid, msg.sender, amountSentLD, amountReceivedLD);
    7286                 :             :     }
    7287                 :             : 
    7288                 :             :     /**
    7289                 :             :      * @dev Internal function to build the message and options.
    7290                 :             :      * @param _sendParam The parameters for the send() operation.
    7291                 :             :      * @param _amountLD The amount in local decimals.
    7292                 :             :      * @return message The encoded message.
    7293                 :             :      * @return options The encoded options.
    7294                 :             :      */
    7295                 :           0 :     function _buildMsgAndOptions(
    7296                 :             :         SendParam calldata _sendParam,
    7297                 :             :         uint256 _amountLD
    7298                 :             :     ) internal view virtual returns (bytes memory message, bytes memory options) {
    7299                 :           0 :         bool hasCompose;
    7300                 :             :         // @dev This generated message has the msg.sender encoded into the payload so the remote knows who the caller is.
    7301                 :           0 :         (message, hasCompose) = OFTMsgCodec.encode(
    7302                 :             :             _sendParam.to,
    7303                 :             :             _toSD(_amountLD),
    7304                 :             :             // @dev Must be include a non empty bytes if you want to compose, EVEN if you dont need it on the remote.
    7305                 :             :             // EVEN if you dont require an arbitrary payload to be sent... eg. '0x01'
    7306                 :             :             _sendParam.composeMsg
    7307                 :             :         );
    7308                 :             :         // @dev Change the msg type depending if its composed or not.
    7309                 :           0 :         uint16 msgType = hasCompose ? SEND_AND_CALL : SEND;
    7310                 :             :         // @dev Combine the callers _extraOptions with the enforced options via the OAppOptionsType3.
    7311                 :           0 :         options = combineOptions(_sendParam.dstEid, msgType, _sendParam.extraOptions);
    7312                 :             : 
    7313                 :             :         // @dev Optionally inspect the message and options depending if the OApp owner has set a msg inspector.
    7314                 :             :         // @dev If it fails inspection, needs to revert in the implementation. ie. does not rely on return boolean

    7405                 :             :      * @dev eg. uint(123) with a conversion rate of 100 becomes uint(100).
    7406                 :             :      */

    7408                 :           0 :         return (_amountLD / decimalConversionRate) * decimalConversionRate;

    7695                 :           0 :             totalUsersClaimed++;

    7697                 :             :

    7709                 :             :     {

    7715                 :          14 :         bytes32 leaf = keccak256(abi.encodePacked(receiver, allocatedAmount));
    7716                 :             : 
    7717         [ #  # ]:          16 :         require(MerkleProof.verify(merkleProof, merkleRoot, leaf), "Invalid merkle proof");
    7718         [ #  # ]:          13 :         require(claims[receiver].claimed == 0, "Already claimed full allocation");
    7719         [ #  # ]:          12 :         require(amountToClaim <= claimableSupply, "Insufficient claimable supply");
    7720                 :             : 
    7721                 :          16 :         claims[receiver].amount = allocatedAmount;
    7722                 :          11 :         totalUsersClaimed++;
    7723                 :             : 
    7724                 :          16 :         _processClaim(receiver, amountToClaim);
    7725                 :             :     }
    7726                 :             : 
    7727                 :             :     /* ▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀ BURN FUNCTIONS ▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀ */
    7728                 :             : 
    7729                 :             :     /**
    7730                 :             :      * @dev Burns tokens from the caller's account
    7731                 :             :      * @param amount The amount of tokens to burn
    7732                 :             :      */
    7733                 :           0 :     function burn(uint256 amount) public virtual {
    7734                 :           0 :         _burn(_msgSender(), amount);
    7735                 :           0 :         totalBurned += amount;
    7736                 :             :     }
    7737                 :             : 
    7738                 :             :     /**
    7739                 :             :      * @dev Burns tokens from a specified account
    7740                 :             :      * @param account The address from which to burn tokens
    7741                 :             :      * @param amount The amount of tokens to burn
    7742                 :             :      */
    7743                 :           0 :     function burnFrom(address account, uint256 amount) public virtual {
    7744                 :           0 :         _spendAllowance(account, _msgSender(), amount);
    7745                 :           0 :         _burn(account, amount);
    7746                 :           0 :         totalBurned += amount;
    7747                 :             :     }
    7748                 :             : 
    7749                 :             :     /* ▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀ INTERNAL FUNCTIONS ▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀ */
    7750                 :             : 
    7751                 :             :     /**
    7752                 :             :      * @dev Processes the user's claim and transfers the tokens.
    7753                 :             :      * @param claimer The address of the user claiming tokens
    7754                 :             :      * @param releaseAmount The number of tokens to release
    7755                 :             :      */
    7756                 :          11 :     function _processClaim(address claimer, uint256 releaseAmount) private {
    7757                 :          11 :         Claim storage userClaim = claims[claimer];
    7758                 :             :         
    7759         [ #  # ]:          11 :         require(releaseAmount <= claimableSupply, "Insufficient claimable supply");
    7760                 :             :         
    7761            [ + ]:          11 :         if (isTGEActive()) {
    7762                 :          11 :             userClaim.claimedAtTGE = true;
    7763                 :             :         }
    7764                 :             : 
    7765                 :          11 :         userClaim.claimed += releaseAmount;
    7766                 :          11 :         userClaim.lastClaimed = block.timestamp;
    7767                 :          11 :         claimableSupply -= releaseAmount;
    7768                 :          11 :         _mint(claimer, releaseAmount);
    7769                 :             :         
    7770                 :          11 :         emit TokensClaimed(claimer, releaseAmount);
    7771                 :             :     }
    7772                 :             : 
    7773                 :             :     /* ▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀ OVERRIDES ▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀ */
    7774                 :             : 
    7775                 :             :     /**
    7776                 :             :      * @dev Overrides the ERC20 _update function to add custom behavior for capped token transfers.
    7777                 :             :      */
    7778                 :         113 :     function _update(address from, address to, uint256 value) internal virtual override(ERC20, ERC20Capped) {
    7779                 :         113 :         super._update(from, to, value);
    7780                 :             :     }
    7781                 :             : 
    7782                 :             :     /**
    7783                 :             :      * @dev Overrides the transferOwnership function to transfer ownership using Ownable2Step.
    7784                 :             :      */
    7785                 :           0 :     function transferOwnership(address newOwner) public virtual override(Ownable, Ownable2Step) onlyOwner {
    7786                 :           0 :         Ownable2Step.transferOwnership(newOwner);
    7787                 :             :     }
    7788                 :             :

    7792                 :          58 :     function _transferOwnership(address newOwner) internal virtual override(Ownable, Ownable2Step) {

    7795                 :             : 
    7796                 :             :     /**

    7800                 :         116 :     function decimals() public pure override returns (uint8) {
    7801                 :         116 :         return DECIMALS;

    7803                 :             : 
    7804                 :             :     /**

    7806                 :             :      * @return The maximum supply of tokens, excluding burned tokens
    7807                 :             :      */
    7808                 :         169 :     function cap() public view virtual override(ERC20Capped) returns (uint256) {
